summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the period ending June 30, 2017. It includes information on account balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transactions to various entities.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the financial statement.

persons.name: Stewart OMB
persons.context: Stewart OMB is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Charles Pickett
persons.context: Charles Pickett is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing funds from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Charles Pickett is identified as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

events.title: Account Statement Summary
events.description: The document summarizes the account activity for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account for the month ending June 30, 2017.

locations: 6100 Red 14ook Quarter, B3 St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account balance for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account as of June 30, 2017, was $230,031.42.
Significant outgoing transactions included transfers to HSBC Bank PLC and Rolls Royce Deutschland Ltd.
The document includes a summary of service charges and fees associated with the account.
Charles Pickett is noted as a recipient of a transfer from Epstein's account.
Stewart OMB is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
